resources.string: : Let the Cleanliness Starts from me
Our goal is to build a clean and sterile Bangladesh by increasing public awareness of using dustbins to change people’s mentality and habit of throwing garbage everywhere.

The main purpose of BD Clean is to establish the status of Bangladesh as one of the cleanest countries to the outside world and to set every citizen of Bangladesh as an example of an ideal citizen worldwide.

Obeying constitutional civic responsibilities is one of the hallmarks of all members of BD Clean. All members of BD Clean are always striving to achieve the reputation of an ideal citizen of Bangladesh to the world. Free from greed, envy and malice, every member of BD Clean respects each other. No member blames each other or the state to avoid civic responsibility. Not the enforcement of the law but every member of BD Clean believes in following all the laws prevailing in the country. In addition, every member who is always active in the service of humanity and country is a unique example in protecting the unity and order of the country. In one word, every member of BD Clean is an ideal citizen of Bangladesh and the whole world.

Any Bangladeshi citizen of any age who is willing to volunteer for the country is eligible to become a member of BD Clean, subject to accepting the rules and regulations of BD Clean. However, his membership will be canceled without notice if he is involved in any anti-state work or expresses opposition to any development work of the state. In addition, indecent behavior and violent attitude towards any member along with disobeying the organizational order will result in the issuance of show cause notice or termination of membership subject to proof.
You are already joined in an event, which is not completed yet. To join event you have to complete or leave from previous event.

To become a member through this app, you will need to agree to the terms of services below.\n\nIn addition, when you create an account, we process your information as described in our privacy policy including this key steps :

For the first time, you have to join a event after you accept terms and condition. You have to complete the event and leave from event within time. After completing the event, a monitor will approve your event joining. After that you have to join in an event again.
After completing four events, a monitor will evaluate your events and approve all event. Then you will be counted as an active member of the organization
After becoming a member, you have to buy a T-Shirt of the company from the store with bKash.
We have sent a code to your contact number to confirm your phone. Please insert the code for confirmation

Please select your current location in which area you want to join BD CLEAN events ( division , district / metropolitan , upazilla / city corporation, union / ward, and village / area .

If you live in rural area then select district , upazilla, union and village.

If you live in metropolitan area select metropolitan , city corporation , ward and area / locality
Date of Establishment and Number of Members
Established on 3 June 2016, this platform currently (as of 3 June 2023) has more than 44,000 active volunteer members working relentlessly to achieve the goals of BD Clean.

I swear to always devote myself to the service of the people and loyalty to the country. I will always strive to maintain the unity and order of the country. I will always dedicate myself to build a clean Bangladesh. Let us be aware that no one around us should throw garbage everywhere. Will always fulfill the constitutional civic duty. All laws in the country will be obeyed. O Lord, give me strength, so that I can serve the country and make Bangladesh a clean, strong and ideal state. Amen

BD Clean selects a specific area on one day every week to clean the area directly or through miking to give awareness to the nearby shopkeepers and general public about not littering and advising on the use of dustbins. Also, each week\'s series of activities begins with a group photo and recitation of the oath with the participation of all the volunteers present.

Clean cities have 46% less germs than unclean cities. As a result, all the people of the country will be protected from the attack of 46% of diseases. Above all, a healthy and clean environment will be ensured for the next generation. Also, the name of our beloved homeland Bangladesh will take place on the world map as a clean country
BD Clean is the platform of voluntary conscious citizens who are continuously working to build a clean and sterile Bangladesh.

This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share, retain and transfer information about you when you use our service. The types of information we collect depend on your membership status and designation level. Each time you promote from your current designation, we collect additional information about you. We also let you know your rights. Each section of the Policy includes simpler language to make our practices easier to understand. We’ve also added links to resources where you can learn more about the privacy topics that interest you. By accessing or using the Service, you agree to this Privacy Policy.

The volunteer is willing to donate their time and service to BD Clean, in turn BD Clean is willing to accept such time and service by the Volunteer. In consideration, the parties hereby agree to the following terms and conditions:
Consent for Reference and Background Check

I do hereby give BD Clean permission to inquire into my personal, family, education, references, driving record, employment, volunteer history, or police record. I further give permission to the holder of any such records to release the same to BD CLEAN. I hereby hold BD CLEAN harmless of any liability, whether civil or criminal, that may arise as a result of the release of information about me. I further hold harmless any individual, agency, business, or corporation that provides information or documents to BD CLEAN. I understand that BD CLEAN will use this information as part of its verification of my volunteer membership application. I further understand that as a BD Clean member, I am not paid for my services.
• Services: The volunteer will serve BD Clean as per their designation mentioned in the constitution.
• Wages: The Volunteer understand the service provided will be a donation and under no circumstances will expect wages, salary, or benefits from BD Clean for the services provided.
• Supervision: The Volunteer should report to the supervisor as per BD Clean constitution.

• Employment: The Volunteer understand they are under no circumstances considered an employee of BD Clean. Furthermore, BD Clean acknowledges the Volunteer is not an employee and may provide service at free will. The Volunteer will receive no employee benefits including disability, service benefits, gratuity, provident fund, severance pay, medical facility or other benefits related monetary benefits.
• Liability: The Volunteer agrees to indemnify and hold the organization harmless against any damages related to the volunteer’s activity.

• Jurisdiction: Any and all legal proceeding that may arise from volunteer activities shall remain in the jurisdiction of BD Clean. The Volunteer agrees that in the instances of legal proceeding they will cooperate with BD Clean as well as the BD Clean’s agents. The Volunteer agrees to provide written notification to BD Clean in the event that an incident take places while the Volunteer is providing services.
• Termination: BD Clean hold the right to terminate any Volunteers at any time without any prior notice or show cause.

A goodwill ambassador is an individual, often a prominent figure or celebrity, who serves as a representative or advocate for a specific cause, organization, or initiative. Goodwill ambassadors use their public profile, influence, and credibility to raise awareness, promote positive messages, and mobilize support for the cause they represent.
We are delighted that you have decided to support us for making a clean and green country by becoming BD Clean Goodwill Ambassador/Inspirational Ambassador.
Please fill out the information below and submit the form. We will process application and get in touch with you.
